pageContext.claim: “We've picked up trillions of dollars in worth since I've been elected. China has lost many, many trillions of dollars. They're way behind. They were going to catch us. Had a Democrat gotten in, namely, the one we're talking about, China would have caught us by the end of her term.”
pageContext.analysis: The combined market capitalization of U.S. or Chinese companies is not necessarily a good indicator of how their economies are faring. Trump often claims that the U.S. economy would be in dire shape had a Democrat won the White House in 2016, but he has no evidence for that claim, and he inherited a growing economy from President Barack Obama.
